SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECU_MUSI_INFO WHERE MUSI_RECU_SEQ=#{musi_recu_seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECU_MUSI_INFO WHERE MUSI_RECU_SEQ=#{musi_recu_seq} AND MUSIID=#{musiid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECU_MUSI_INFO WHERE MUSi_RECU_SEQ=#{musi_recu_seq} AND MUSIID=#{musiid}
mapper.select: SELECT A.EDATE,A.TITLE,A.MUSI_RECU_SEQ,A.PERFORM_SEQ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MUSI_RECU_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM,EDATE,TITLE,MUSI_RECU_SEQ,PERFORM_SEQ,APPROVAL FROM MUSI_RECU_BBS WHERE EDATE <= SYSDATE AND APPROVAL=0) A WHERE RNUM <= 5 ORDER BY A.EDATE DESC

SELECT A.EDATE,A.TITLE,A.MUSI_RECU_SEQ,A.PERFORM_SEQ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MUSI_RECU_SEQ DESC) AS RNUM,EDATE,TITLE,MUSI_RECU_SEQ,PERFORM_SEQ,APPROVAL FROM MUSI_RECU_BBS WHERE EDATE <= SYSDATE AND APPROVAL=0) A WHERE RNUM > 5
mapper.update: UPDATE MUSI_RECU_BBS SET APPROVAL=1 WHERE MUSI_RECU_SEQ=#{musi_recu_seq}
UPDATE RECU_MUSI_INFO SET SELECT_MUSI=1 WHERE MUSIID=#{musiid}
